wikipedia_page.main: Graham John Clark (born 20 January 1961) is a Scottish former footballer who made six appearances in the English Football League for Darlington and 41 in the Scottish League for Montrose. A midfielder, Clark began his career with Sheffield United without playing for them in the League. He represented Scotland at schoolboy international level.
